text.more: Asylum-Bureaucratic Complex comprised of the connections between an individual seeking asylum at Australian airports and the state actors involved in implementing the obligation of non-refoulement with whom they might come into direct or indirect contact. These networks use empirical data to map a representative sample of six different ego-centric networks, derived from fifteen different possible legal categorisations of people seeking asylum at Australian airports. Egos appear as yellow, circular nodes. Alters appear as blue, circular nodes. Indirect ties between egos and alters are represented by pink lines. Direct ties between egos and alters are represented as teal lines.
